content: introducing the cedar ridge crochet dishcloth a fun and easy dishcloth pattern with step by step beginner video tutorial if you re looking for a quick and enjoyable crochet project that also looks great in your kitchen then this is the pattern for you with its charming vintage and feminine vibe this dishcloth is perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your home the striped pattern allows you to play with different colors and create unique combinations that reflect your personal style and the best part it s really easy to make even if you re a beginner you ll be able to follow along with the step-by-step video tutorial that comes with the pattern not only is this dishcloth beautiful and functional but it s also eco-friendly and sustainable you can use it over and over again reducing your carbon footprint and minimizing waste plus it makes a great gift for anyone who loves handmade items or wants to live a more environmentally-conscious lifestyle so what are you waiting for head over to my website and get your hands on the easy and fun striped crochet dishcloth pattern today you ll love how simple and enjoyable it is to make and how lovely it looks in your kitchen ️✨ finished measurements 11 5 x 11 5 with trim 9 5 x 9 5 without trim materials list main colour of dishcloth bernat handicrafter cotton yarn by yarnspirations 1 skeins x 84yds/1 75oz - 77m/50g trim bernat handicrafter cotton yarn by yarnspirations 25g 5 50 mm crochet hook recommend cotton worsted weight yarns dishie dishie multi billow tapestry needle stitch markers scissors this crochet washcloth / dishcloth pattern is worked in row if making the washcloth or dishcloth bigger or smaller make sure you keep the beginning chain a multiple of 2 works up great in any worsted weight yarn beginner step by step video tutorial included if you can do single_crochet chain stitch you can make this pattern in american crochet terms skill level is easy
